meanings.definition: Having an effect on blood vessels.
meanings.sent1: The vasoactive medication helped dilate the blood vessels.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a vasoactive drug to regulate blood flow.
meanings.sent3: The vasoactive solution made the blood vessels dance like tiny snakes.
meanings.sent4: Her words were vasoactive, causing a rush of emotions in him.
meanings.sent5: The vasoactive substance painted a vivid picture of the blood vessels expanding.

meanings.definition: A substance that affects blood vessels.
meanings.sent1: The vasoactive was administered to improve circulation.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying new vasoactives for heart health.
meanings.sent3: The vasoactive seemed to whisper secrets to the blood vessels.
meanings.sent4: His love was like a vasoactive, influencing her every move.
meanings.sent5: The vasoactive substance was a key player in the body's vascular system.
